website_summaries.verdict: A one-stop shop for console gamers, this premium bundle includes the powerful Xbox One S, Minecraft, and other red-hot titles.
pros: No need for discs with this convenient all-digital console bundle
Comes with wireless controller, one month of Xbox Live Gold, and download codes for Minecraft and other great games
Streams 4K video through Netflix, Amazon, and Hulu
cons: The Xbox One S cannot play games in 4K

customer_reviews.title: No box?
customer_reviews.text: Product is fine, but was dropped off on my doorstep just like that, with no box. Anyone happened to walk by, wouldve seen an xbox sitting on my doorstep, asking to get stolen.
customer_reviews.author: BigmanSocal

customer_reviews.title: 5⭐️
customer_reviews.text: New, fully sealed, the codes weren’t expired, nothing damaged, and it’s working great. 10/10 would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Overall review
customer_reviews.text: I love this Xbox one s it runs great and this is my first Xbox but one thing I don’t get is when I try to type in the Fortnite redeem code it says code is already redeemed but overall great game console.
customer_reviews.author: K-von

customer_reviews.title: Everything works as it should.
customer_reviews.text: I'm saving up a bit so I can rebuild my PC, it's out of commission due to some component failure. I got the xbox one s all digital to fill its place. It was cheaper for the one without the CD drive. Everything appears to be working as it should. I don't particularly like the menu, I occasionally forget how to navigate it, but like I said I'm a PC gamer. My internet connection works fine for wifi.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Awesome console at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Got this to play online with some friends. Works great. Slim profile and the white is really attractive. Best part is the amazing price.
customer_reviews.author: Timo Rinne

customer_reviews.title: Great console for perfect price!
customer_reviews.text: The best option for those who want to keep everything in the cloud. Works great, although the interface is a bit messy at first if you are using Xbox for the first time, it's just a matter of time to get know each other :) Besides this, you get a 3-month game pass for $1, so your happy new year is already provided.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Can’t beat the price! I got this as a second unit. One for living room, one for bedroom
customer_reviews.author: Kevin H.

customer_reviews.title: Crazy EXPENSIVE digital games!  Don’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: The idea is good and the gameplay is fine. However, I wouldn’t recommend this until the pricing gets in line. Games you can buy on Amazon brand new on disc are fairly cheap. However, none I’ve purchased came with digital codes and digital versions are typically WAY more expensive. Example, Golf Club 2019 is $19.99. Want the digital version? That’ll be $49.99. Why? I get no disc, no plastic, no shipping, yet it costs 2.5 times as much!? Crazy. Get this pricing in line Amazon/Microsoft! Otherwise buy a version that accepts discs and save yourself in the long run. I wouldn’t buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: R. Shelton

customer_reviews.title: PACKAGE IT vs SHIP AS IS!!
customer_reviews.text: Ok...so for the XBOX awesome...for the packaging...you may WANT TO PUT IT IN A BOX FOR CONCEALMENT PURPOSES!!! Reason 1, Neighborhood kids knocked on the door to see who was home, why you ask?? BECAUSE THERE WAS A BRAND NEW XBOX ONE SITTING IN THE OPEN AT MY DOOR!! Reason 2, Husband and three boys opened door to find a brand new XBOX one and neighborhood kids looking at the BRAND NEW XBOX ONE!! Reason 3, ITS COMMON SENSE!!! Thank you have a fabulous day!!
customer_reviews.author: Pitbullmum3

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied!!
customer_reviews.text: Works GREAT! All the codes worked too. I was hesitant cuz of all the bad reviews involving the codes not working etc. They definitely work though and I would recommend anyone in need of a cheap Xbox One S to buy this. Also, other customers seemed to have issues with the Xbox being shipped in just the console box. Mine was in the console box inside a cardboard box just as you would expect it to be.
customer_reviews.author: Julien Slefo

customer_reviews.title: Great console
customer_reviews.text: Came in fast delivery and everything was new and sealed codes work just fine and and system came in a private box so no one knows what's inside. I read a review saying it just came in the reg Xbox system box so I was little scared about that and the codes not working but everything works great highly recommend and don't have to worry about my 1year old constantly ejecting my disc or getting something stuck lol
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: No issues!
customer_reviews.text: Now before you purchase beware. This DOES NOT PLAY DISC’S! I myself prefer all my games to be digital seeing as I have multiple systems in my home. But it’s literally the same as any Xbox One S, just not disc drive. You can still sync multiple controllers. You can still use external hard drives or SSD’s for faster speeds or more storage. All 3 game codes were valid along with the free month of live code. Has worked flawless and was exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Mathis

customer_reviews.title: No extra Box to put it in
customer_reviews.text: My first order that game in a regular box .. we come home from some we’re and the new Xbox one I got for my kids for Xmas is sitting on the porch.. did you run out of extra boxes? Or it could have been stolen.
customer_reviews.author: ryan

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The xbox one s digital edition shut off after a few hours of play and will not turn back on, the light will come on for about 3 seconds after the system makes the start up noise then the light will go black and the tv remains black. I will try to see if it turns on after a few hours of being off but if it doesn't I will be exchanging or returning. Always been an xbox fan and I have every edition xbox one from the original to the xbox one x white edition(excluding the digital edition) but I just bought this as a gift and am very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Use caution if this is a gift!!
customer_reviews.text: This is to be a holiday gift for a teenager in my house. It literally arrived with a label glued onto the side of the Xbox box - NO outer box at all. Guess whose job it is to collect the mail and packages each day? Yup. Very strange that it arrived in that condition. I'm sure it works fine, but there will be no surprise on Christmas morning. Disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Tharakan

customer_reviews.title: Seems strange stopped working one day after return deadline
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our son for Christmas and on January 31 one day after the return window closed he came to us saying the screen says no signal. We have tried everything new hdmi different TVs resetting it with no luck. I have spoke on several occasions with customer service with very little help or any return calls. I also spoke with some friends who have had the same issue and also no help. We decided no more buying TVs game consoles or anything else online as we have had other issues with electronics before.
customer_reviews.author: regman

customer_reviews.title: Typical
customer_reviews.text: I mean it's an Xbox what do you expect...games with gold are trash, can't even charge your phone or headset with the usb ports, takes ages to boot up if you don't use quick boot which consumes power. Not to mention if you play online games at higher levels everyone is mnk. Otherwise shipping was early, package was kinda damaged but contents weren't so good there. All in all it's not a PS4 so don't expect greatness unless you love watching tv from it
customer_reviews.author: Profonics

customer_reviews.title: Refurbished consoles!!!!
customer_reviews.text: So, I bought this for my husband as a Christmas gift. All the codes were already redeemed. Stubborn me should have listened to the reviews here but I was thinking I am one of the lucky ones that will not get scammed. Nothing on the details says its a refurbished console but Microsoft confirmed that console was first used in October 2019 that's why all the codes are not working. I even have a ticket # from Microsoft. I brought this to Amazon's attention and their customer service is saying on their end it shows brand new and all they can offer is a return label so I can get a full refund. Merry Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Katya SH

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price, get em while they’re still cheap.
customer_reviews.text: Great deal for its $149.99 Black Friday sale price. If you got some spare change to scoop up and slap a $150 spot for an entertainment system, then this is for you. Cheap and fun, good games to play on it aswell. Comes with 1 controller and all the plugins, hooks up to the 4K tv without a hassle. Very light and compact, fits right next to our TV sound bar.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Very happy.
customer_reviews.text: Apprehension of not having a disc tray rapidly disappeared when I saw how fast the digital content downloaded. I hate having cd cases stacked up anyway and the games are much cheaper for digital only.
customer_reviews.author: jlscott81

customer_reviews.title: Controller constantly disconnecting
customer_reviews.text: The games play ok when it’s done loading for a couple minutes, but the avatar creator was extremely laggy, like 5 seconds lag, my brand new controller that came with it disconnects every 10 seconds on the second day of owning this thing.
customer_reviews.author: FrostySquidKid

customer_reviews.title: The kid lives for this thing.
customer_reviews.text: I personally am unfamiliar with what this gaming console is capable of seeing how I prefer all activities that are non-gaming related. However, it sure did make the little minion super duper happy and so I have to assume it's awesome given the fact that she spends literally every waking hour with headset on and eyes glued to the screen...Despite the fact that my husband tried desperately, and failed, to convert her over to PS. One tidbit that may or may not be helpful is that whatevers playing looks rad on our 4k TV.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisSmith

customer_reviews.title: Such a bad experience
customer_reviews.text: Was so excited when I got it. It looked very nice. I set it up and was downloading games on it. First two hours it shut off by itself while downloading games and I didn’t think too much of it. But as time when on it just kept shutting off to the point where it wouldn’t turn back on. This all happened in the first 4 hours I received it and I was super disappointed. I wouldn’t recommend taking a chance on these. Going to try to buy one in person instead.
customer_reviews.author: timmy

customer_reviews.title: make sure to check that everything works properly
customer_reviews.text: overall great but there is one problem I have , how does a brand new controller already have a defective A button right out of the box ! it makes no sense. Its all brand new in packaging and the A button doesnt function properly aka it doesnt click when you press the button it just slowly moves
customer_reviews.author: Christopher olguin

customer_reviews.title: Digital world
customer_reviews.text: This digital Xbox is really nice! My almost 5 year old Just likes to play Roblox and sometimes Minecraft so it's perfect for that. We don't really have the need for discs that are going to get lost or scratched it's a digital world these days so this is just fine!
customer_reviews.author: amy

customer_reviews.title: Excelent condition
customer_reviews.text: Love it , just wat I was expecting and the best you don't have to have all those mess of CDs games
customer_reviews.author: Emely

customer_reviews.title: A Good Bargain for Gaming
customer_reviews.text: I've had a lot of fun with this video console and its games. I'm no kid either and I'm not kidding that this isn't just for kids. It's for senior citizens, too, like myself. It helps to keep my brain from being idle. Oh, it's great for kids too. My grandniece and nephew enjoy playing the games, too, when I let them play with the Xbox. Highly recommend it for young, old, and in-between.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Maintaining cognitive function and more time with my kids? Score!
customer_reviews.text: My son bought this for me as a gift when I asked to borrow his to try it out. I’ve been reading more and more how gaming helps keep up cognitive function and fine motor skills. I also more or less stopped gaming after classic NES 😂 This has been a joy to get back into gaming and spend more time playing with my grown/nearly grown kids! Bonus: as it’s a direct Ethernet cable it streams better than my wireless streaming device
customer_reviews.author: W. Michael Fisher

customer_reviews.title: The console that turned my daughter into a gamer
customer_reviews.text: When I originally bought this I didn’t know that it didn’t take disks but only downloadable digital codes and that was my error for not reading the description properly. Besides that, the only complaint I have is that you must have an Xbox live subscription account to play games even if they have already been purchased. Seeing how most games are $40+ dollars I think it’s crazy you have to pay for a monthly subscription to access your games when they have already been bought. Other than that, my daughter loves playing Just Dance, Fortnite, and Call of Duty on this.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Disc less is NOT BAD at all
customer_reviews.text: I really love this Xbox. It is definitely the better platform over the PS4. However, the slow loading time is killer in my opinion(although it's faster then the PS4) Some games take forever to load. But that's just modern platforms for you. Not being able to put discs into the system really doesnt matter, the only thing I'd say sucks about that is you have to wait for the game to download. Call of duty modern warfare is over 100 GB, so unless you have super fast internet, it could take a pretty long time to download. Other then that, I would reccomend it.
customer_reviews.author: Sanjit Toor

customer_reviews.title: Just an extra
customer_reviews.text: You don't want this console if you have a bunch of disc, which obviously is a no brainer. I don't think people got the genius behind the discless console though. Do away with disc and you NEVER LOSE YOUR STUFF. Gf wanted another one for her own account and because I hog the One X in the living room lol I bought this. I hate that it's white though hate it. I'm a smoker. And white gets dirty way to easy. But I couldn't find any black ones on here. Being that it's discontinued though it doesn't surprise me. They probably swept up the black ones as soon as they went on sale. Awesome buy though.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Works and FAST SHIPPING
customer_reviews.text: Works great! THANK YOU to the seller for the super-fast shipping. This was scheduled to arrive between March 26 and Match 31, and we got it on March 23. Currently working from home, two kids, and their Switch was sent off for a normal charge port repair which has been held up by the COVID-19 shutdown, and a related delays in receiving parts from China. This was a God send. They are playing and NOT FIGHTING. Thank you SO MUCH. Cannot reasonably expect kids their ages to sit quietly and do 8 hours of learning activities while I work. Seriously, thank you.
customer_reviews.author: C. Waycott

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy!!
customer_reviews.text: It was a Christmas gift to my boyfriend. He had broken his other console recently. He took it right out of the box and hooked it up. He likes that it is all digital and that it has 1TB (shrugs). He was so excited to play around on it and the free codes were also a huge plus. There were 3. Fortnite, Minecraft and a Sea game. He gave those to our son.
customer_reviews.author: MommyShopper3

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Cyber Monday deal!!
customer_reviews.text: Clean look Xbox. Easy use. Controller works great. Only wish we could get a USB wire controller and simple headset. However, for the price from Cyber Monday, it is great bundle! Extra games provided was a great plus! 1 month of Xbox Live complimentary was awesome too! Downloading games is easy. Only thing you need, is a little patience to download high GB games. Game play is great! I play Diablo 3 Eternal Collection and the loading screens between stages moves quickly. Overall for me 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Dan The Machanic

customer_reviews.title: Best Xmas Gift
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it! I love not having to purchase disc & fussing bc they are all over the floor getting scratched up!! Everything is digital!
customer_reviews.author: Nursj0nes

customer_reviews.title: I think there's something wrong with people.
customer_reviews.text: I think there's something wrong with most humans. Mentally wise. the Xbox One old digital is exactly the same as the Xbox with the CD drive/Dvd. the only difference is it is a digital version meaning it has no CD drive. You don't have to worry about buying CDs or losing CDs. Having boxes full of xbox one CDs. I don't know why some people give it bad review makes no sense. You already know it's all digital and has No CD drive. You have to download your games. Overall I love my Xbox One. Already beat several games
customer_reviews.author: Jorge G.

customer_reviews.title: Xbox One S 1TB All-Digital Edition Console (Disc-free Gaming)
customer_reviews.text: Works fine. Just remember that it has no disc drive so it's all downloaded content which could get high on data usage for big games if you're downloading a ton in a month. I know this because my son put us over our 1TB of data mark. Other than being aware of that, enjoy yourself!
customer_reviews.author: Chumplestilskin

customer_reviews.title: Mistakes happen.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a second Xbox console. I play on this one while my son plays on my Xbox x console. This thing sucks, to say the least. I have had it struggling to operate at times. You know when you are on a crappy computer and you click on two things and then it just slows down and you are thinking, Oh boy, it is about to crash? That is what this does from time to time. It works but be warned it is the cheap version of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I am not a gamer. I only recently (January) started playing video games like Grand Theft Auto 5. So I needed my own Xbox so hubby and I could play together. I chose this mainly because it was digital and since I don't play a lot of games, I thought this would be enough and it is. I'm highly satisfied with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Norma Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Trying to get help
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these for 2 of my granddaughters that live here with me, one works great, we have had nothing but problems with it. The other one, she never played but once of twice because it was to slow, then it would not load the games, when it did it would freeze and could not play, and as of April, it want even turn on.. calling all around and messaging to get help, and nothing yet....... Ive been trying since Feb, to get help with it, and keep getting the run around.. I don't have the money to buy another one for her.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase, 10/10
customer_reviews.text: Bought this during COVID-19 lockdown. Gave instructions for delivery driver to leave package indoors as I wouldn't be around. I left the front door unlocked and it arrived exactly where I had requested it to be— indoors. I wasn't about to leave such an expensive item outside for however long I would be gone. Parcel arrived exactly 5 days after I ordered it, as promised. Item is brand new, comes with free but limited Live Gold subscription and Game Pass. Inside was also three free games: Minecraft, Sea of Thieves and Fortnite. Hooked it up, and it ran flawlessly. Very pleased, good job Microsoft and Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Kai

customer_reviews.title: Digitally Worth the Investment
customer_reviews.text: It’s such a smooth and low-sounding console. I still own the previous Xbox One I purchased in 2015 but I couldn’t pass up a bargain of a lifetime when this One S went on sale during Christmas time. Granted that it’s purely all digital, I really enjoy playing my games on there. It also doesn’t heat up as often compared to the original Xbox One!
customer_reviews.author: Sean Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Slightly satisfied, would be happy if the remote would work.
customer_reviews.text: The controller does not work. The right trigger button doesn’t respond when you touch it, at times you will randomly get a message saying the remote has been disconnected, please reconnect while the remote is still on, or the light will be on but the remote won’t respond to touch. The system is great so far but the remote not working definitely has a major effect in my opinion and decision to purchase any other electronics from Amazon & this supplier
customer_reviews.author: Ashanti McLean

customer_reviews.title: Perfect all around media player
customer_reviews.text: I Bought the Xbox 1S all digital back in February. I use it stricly for streaming. If you have internet and cable with Spectrum you can use this with Spectrum app instead of paying for cable boxes. I also watch Netflix, Vudu, Stars, and various other streaming channels on this device. I bought this particularly for my bedroom. Works perfectly. I use it on wifi only just incase whoever reads this wants to know. I already have a dedicated blue-ray player so the all digital Xbox 1S is all I needed. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cee Jay

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a christmas gift for my child and they absolutely love it. I own the xbox one x and figured it would be more than my child would ever need, so this was a great option. And the disc free part is even better. I cant remember the last time I've even bought a hard copy of a game and we have other means of watching physical content so didnt need this console to have a disc drive. Overall, if you're familiar with the xbox brand, there isnt a ton to mention about this as it's what you'd expect already.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: It’s a digital machine. That means, you cannot play cds or DVD’s
customer_reviews.text: This is a digital machine. I didn’t even know this was possible. I was so enamored by the price that I didn’t even notice that you can’t place a cd in it. It’s cool because I buy all of my games online. However; I didn’t buy it for me. I bought this for my kid. They’re cool with it. I went back and looked at the ad. It says it clear as day. So, new machine that you can’t play cds or dvds on? Still cool. I’d rather stream anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Zac

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: My kids have been wanting an xbox for years. My husband and I dont know anything about gaming or systems. I'm glad we were able to surprise them with this at Christmas. They love it, and I love that I dont have to keep track of discs.
customer_reviews.author: Tenabells

customer_reviews.title: Everything that I want
customer_reviews.text: This has it all to me. I don't really watch DVD/Blu-Ray disks any longer so not having the disc player was not really a problem. The only problem if that since I was upgrading from a XBOX 360 to this I now don't have the ability to use the old physical media that I have, but this isn't really a problem since I didn't really use them anyways. And if I want to play the old games I can purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Steinbrunner

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Xbox for an amazing price!
customer_reviews.text: Considering that my husband prefers digital gaming over discs, I was really excited for this xbox! Not only was an "all digital xbox" an amazing idea but I was thrilled to have purchased it considering it was nearly half price of a traditional one! So far, it works amazing and when it arrived, it looked brand-spankin-new as if I got it at the store. I will update my review if anything goes wrong with it but it's been working great without complications so far!
customer_reviews.author: Madison C

customer_reviews.title: Controller only lasts an hour or so. Original Xbox 1 controller still kicking years later.
customer_reviews.text: I am writing a review in hope the seller will see. My controller is faulty. The battery drains within a few hours. But it took me time to recognize this. And I've wasted many batteries. The Xbox itself is fine. What can I do to get reimbursed for a controller that works properly??
customer_reviews.author: Emaun Anway

customer_reviews.title: Used
customer_reviews.text: So I ordered this new and paid full price. I received the Xbox today, and it was USED. The code for the free add-ons had already been redeemed, games had been installed, two cables were missing, the controller was thrown into the box with dead batteries(why even give them??), the controller was dirty, and finally there was even a profile that was still signed in. This came in the original box, and was marked NEW. This is NOT a new product. don’t pay full price.
customer_reviews.author: C. Clarke

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: there isn't much to say about this, it is a digital xbox edition. i bought this to replace the xbox one that my sons used until it died. i was definitely happy to find this for the price it was, though.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Concannon

customer_reviews.title: Xbox needs to fix some annoyances.
customer_reviews.text: First off, great price and fast shipping-no issues there. Only reason for 4 stars is Xbox doesn’t support any Bluetooth headset that isn’t Microsoft specific, so my arctis 7 headset doesn’t work wirelessly. Lastly the controller takes double A batteries while other consoles controllers have rechargeable batteries. Kind of minor issues but still issues non the less.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor perry

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about this system! It's light and compact, very easy to travel with if necessary. Also, it's all-digital, so that completely cuts out the hassle of having to go and stand in line at GameStop, Walmart etc. just to buy the physical copy of a game. And lastly all your digital game purchases from other Xbox consoles transfer over seamlessly and you can pick up wherever you last left off. Overall I highly recommend this system, I'm loving it so far and I'm really glad I purchased it when I did. 💯
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Wallington Jr

customer_reviews.title: You need to buy this
customer_reviews.text: Awsome Xbox, this was me finally going to the new system, I still had the 360. I got it for streaming Disney+, Netflix, YouTube and my kids have the games built in. Extremely happy with this and the price was outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: Julio Flores

customer_reviews.title: Get PLAYSTATION or pay more later
customer_reviews.text: Wanted my son to be able to play fortnight with friends only to find out Xbox requires Xbox live Gold membership to be able to play with friends. So they can't even access the full game thats (included) with the console. Unless u pay $60 a year for a membership. Playstation needs no memberships and I fortnight is a free game! Information I wish I had before purchasing!!
customer_reviews.author: Yomomma

customer_reviews.title: Clean look. Runs smooth. Faster loading.
customer_reviews.text: Got this so the wife and I could game together without sharing a TV. I got the new XBox and she got the new TV. The new XBox loads into areas so much faster than the old one even though I'm on WiFi and she's has a direct connection to the router with the old XBox. If you're old XBox is running slow or it's just old, might as well grab this cheap new one or wait for the new system to come out eventually.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great Console
customer_reviews.text: First Xbox I’ve ever owned. I absolutely love it!! I bought two games and they work well on it. I will definitely be recommending this to people. Great for first time gamers, like myself.
customer_reviews.author: Rebeca

customer_reviews.title: Love this little machine!!
customer_reviews.text: The shipping was faster than a meth head on crack but the 1tb is definitely worth it since all of you’re games are going to be download only! I have a pc so I bought it because I wanted to play with friends. 3 reasons why to buy this Xbox 1. It comes with codes for mincraft, sea of thieves, and a code for fornite, 2. It’s a 1TB console and there expensive to buy! 3. It comes with 1month of live gold!.
customer_reviews.author: Topromonboi

customer_reviews.title: Extremely disappointed
customer_reviews.text: At first I loved this... However after 6 days of using this Xbox it no longer works. Signed on today and tried to load up several different games and they all froze then turned into a black screen. After hard resetting my Xbox and doing all the procedures directed by Microsoft the Xbox turns on for about 3 seconds without showing anything on screen then turns off by itself. I’ve played on this console for about 6 days and it’s already broken. I guess it’s just bad luck? Not sure. Hopefully I’m able to get a refund or a new Xbox.
customer_reviews.author: Bryson

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT DO THIS!!!!  READ BEFORE PURCHASING!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT ATTEMPT THIS!. The game pass ultimate is not loaded on the Xbox as it should be. Xbox will tell you it is a citizens one problem and citizens one will tell you it is an Xbox problem. Neither knows anything about the other. Amazon, the seller, is completely clueless when it comes to this problem. I should have read the reviews but I jumped at this offer. I got approved easy enough but did not get the game pass ultimate.
customer_reviews.author: Jason P

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Buy
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this zero stars I would. I purchased this Xbox for my son for Christmas but when he tried to use it didn’t work. Huge bummer on Christmas Day! They did work with me and sent me another but now it’s only been used for 6 months and it’s been randomly turning off when he plays it. Waste of money!!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Everything I expected
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift. Everything I expected. It's smaller than the original Xbox One, which I like. After updates it holds about 972gbs. I advise if you downloading a big game or any game, watch something instead of playing because the download time will be long. I downloaded GTAV in less than an hour. I'm pretty happy with the outcome of this product
customer_reviews.author: DreadedOwl

customer_reviews.title: Cool all in one media and game console
customer_reviews.text: The console is awesome I thought I would miss the discs but having the less mess of digital only copies is actually kind of nice. It was a nice xmas gift and my BF loves it. We both play games on it now and use it for YouTube, Netflix etc as well. A good all in one media player as well. I will probably by another for my nephew since he has issues just taking care of his PS4 Discs and this will alleviate the scratched disc problems.
customer_reviews.author: Jochebed Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Complete Disappointment and a Giant Headache
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas present for my two sons and I could not be less satisfied with the purchase. The system is overly complex, constantly freezes, seems to require multiple subscriptions to fully utilize, and came with expired game cards. Awful.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Spaulding

customer_reviews.title: Yep, it's an Xbox. Does what an Xbox does
customer_reviews.text: I knew exactly what we were getting. It turns on, you download content with a subscription, and you play games and media. No frills. It's a gaming console. Considering purchasing another to replace my PC gaming setup, at this price. I'm not a crazy gamer, but I love my racing sims. Wheel/pedal combo with the handbrake plug and play. Not sure what else to say; it's an XBox..
customer_reviews.author: Jace T

customer_reviews.title: Works great even with WiFi
customer_reviews.text: I was a little hesitant based on the reviews that mentioned to avoid with WiFi. I'm currently out in the country with slow internet and WiFi. It works fantastic and downloaded in a very respectable time. The have do not stall, it stays connected and provided hours of neck cramps. Got this affordable machine.
customer_reviews.author: Got it here.

customer_reviews.title: You're better off spending a little more for the brand new one.
customer_reviews.text: Console itself was dusty, the controller still has dead skin on the sticks, and the box was destroyed. Console fired up and works but given the obvious lack of care put into this item being "refurbished" I'm nervous about the performance going forward and I'd highly suggest spending the extra $20 to get a brand new One S, especially if you want Minecraft and/or Fortnight stuff as it comes with that, but mostly for peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: rick

customer_reviews.title: Perfect upgrade from the original Xbox one.
customer_reviews.text: Great version! Love that I don’t have to worry about disc. Just download and play. Small and powerful. Picture is great. Wish it came in black. Was a perfect upgrade from the original Xbox one. Great price at $150. Will hold me over till the new Xbox comes out later this year.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my 12 year old as a surprise Christmas gift. He was extremely thrilled. We’ve not had it long but so far no problems at all. We were able to score some great add ones and for $149 I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: SNichole

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace my loss of sports watching during this COVID 19 crisis. Can't beat the deal. This was cheap, shipped fast and meets my needs. Just added a second controller and then an EA Access account to access a ton of EA sports games. No issues playing the 2019 versions for very low cost.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin D

customer_reviews.title: Keeping families close!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Don't have to worry about game disc's, comes with a month game pass for free plus I got three months more for about buck! I bought this for me for Christmas so I could play games with my granddaughter online. I now live over 1600 miles away so this is awesome that I can remain close with her. We play Minecraft and LegoWorld. I'm so glad I purchased the Xbox One.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Console is fine, controller was broken
customer_reviews.text: Xbox was perfect but the "new controller" that came with it was broken, the select button does not work. I didnt realize it until today when my son told me he has been using his old one because the new one did not work and he didnt want me to be upset as it was a christmas gift for him.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: It’s a great upgrade
customer_reviews.text: I upgraded from the original Xbox one to this which I think is great. When you came in I was so excited to see it. I like that it doesn’t have the disc inserts which saves a lot of room, I also like that it’s way smaller and easier to move places. Overall it’s the same Xbox as any other updated one and it looks great
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth Lord

customer_reviews.title: Xbox games at a great value.
customer_reviews.text: Another winner from Xbox. The digital system was easy to install and get running and the all digital format works great for younger players so there's no worries about game discs being left out to be damaged. And the easy to set parental controls make keeping the surprise purchases off your credit card easy as well as keeping the games you don't want off their screens.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan F Stancil

customer_reviews.title: All Digital
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t realize what the “All Digital” Edition meant until it was on the way to me. I said something’s off on this console...No Disc slot what??? Perfectly fine this was an replacement so it was just what I needed I buy digital copies of all my games so it’s fitting...plays and looks just the same. Great deal for $149. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Trip Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for kids
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect xbox for kids or people that no longer buy physical games, I have myself a regular disc-reading xbox one s and have never bought a physical game so this cheaper and perfectly functional version is great. It is also great for kids as they don't have to deal with discs getting them broken or scratched or lost. If the next xbox comes disc free I would definitely buy that one!
customer_reviews.author: Ali Torres

customer_reviews.title: Great concept...
customer_reviews.text: Love that it's a great price and it's smaller than the old x-box but if you buy a game u cain't sell it back so that's the only down side...
customer_reviews.author: Carrier's

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Came brand new and was simple and easy to setup. Function as described. No issues so far. For me, it works best when connected directly to the router.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good enough for me!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted an Xbox One so I can play some of its exclusives, though I don't want too much clutter. I decided to get the all-digital version, despite the negative press it got initially. However, the system is great for me! I can still play the games and not worry about not having any space in my entertainment center in my room. It's an excellent console for me and I enjoy it every moment with it.
customer_reviews.author: LadyDuoMaxwell

customer_reviews.title: It has its pros and cons
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving Microsoft 3 stars because of two things. First, the setup code was essentially a cuss word. Not exactly what I want showing across my TV for 20 minutes while everything updates on the gaming system I bought my 8 year old. Other than that it has been a fairly good product. Second issue, I wish the remote controls worked from the 360. Now I have to go and buy a new controller so my kids can play together, when I already have 3. Ridiculous.
customer_reviews.author: Richelle

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these. One for my sister and one for myself. Products arrived earlier than expected in a sealed packaged box but should have came with protection surrounding the console inside. Everything was brand new in the box and works 100%. No issues except I wish xbox made this console with a bigger hard drive. 1T isnt enough for an all digital console. I recommend buying an external hard drive and purchasing the xbox game pass if your going to buy this. Oh and another controller as well if you plan on playing split screen. Other than that, I LOVE this beautiful console!
customer_reviews.author: VEE

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my kids
customer_reviews.text: I wish it came with a wireless and a wired controller but I love that it came with the 3 game codes. It looks great and very responsive.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: No more scratched disc's!
customer_reviews.text: Great for anyone that doesn't already own an Xbox and this is great for my kids who don't like to put the disc back in the case. Only downside is no GameStop discounts on games, you'll have to pay full price for the game (if it's not on sale in the Xbox app)
customer_reviews.author: Lord_Theoden

customer_reviews.title: Don’t do online
customer_reviews.text: So I love Xbox’s all about it but the gold card it said I could do it online while it was updating I added it on my account from my phone app and then got on the Xbox and it wouldn’t allow me to use the card said it was already used but it’s on the same account so I had to buy one
customer_reviews.author: amber

customer_reviews.text: perfectly new condition, codes worked completely fine, loved how they included batteries for the controller. love the sleek look of all white. easy setup! tip: if you upgraded & have some xbox one 1st gen DVD games, some of them actually have download codes located inside the papers somewhere! don’t throw or give them away thinking you have to rebuy games!!
customer_reviews.author: nicole

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful console at a bargain price!
customer_reviews.text: Console is wonderful! Love that it doesn’t require disks with the digital only download, and easy way to play top rated games. I docked a star because of the shipping. It’s shipped via UPS, not amazon shipping. Shipment came late and the Xbox box, which was packed inside another generic cardboard box, was dented like it had been dropped. Did not affect the Xbox’s playability though.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Junk. 1 month old. Crashed. Will not turn back on.
customer_reviews.text: After owning this for about 1 month it keeps making a loud noise then crashing and shutting itself off while I’m playing games. This last time it won’t turn back on. I’ve been trying for over a day now to get it to turn back on. Junk.
customer_reviews.author: Colton

customer_reviews.title: Great version
customer_reviews.text: Love how their isn't a noisy disc drive going all the time and this thing is small too and quiet all the time I'm very happy with it and don't miss the disc drive at all
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pissed off
customer_reviews.text: We have only had this unit for five months in use and the HDMI output has malfunctioned and the Xbox is virtually useless now. It will be over $200 to fix the problem apparently. So essentially I now have a $200 paperweight not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca W. Speakman

customer_reviews.title: White box is good box
customer_reviews.text: This device is probable my best purchase. This Xbox One SAD works flawlessly, high graphics, great gameplay and performance. I got gta5 in a decent download time of 20 hours, and halo mcc and halo 5 are downloading at the time of this review. I've had this for about a week, and the first batteries only just got low, so great power saving. I'd still recomend investing in some safe rechargeable batteries wich I plan on buying soon. I dont know what to say that you cant find out in any average mind numbing review or your 100th unboxing. So I recomend just buying this $170 white box, it's worth the green picture papers.
customer_reviews.author: Zypher

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Only downside is that games eat up a lot of memory so you will have to buy an external memory device. Also, the games take hours to download. I have to order the game at the end of the night and let the Xbox run all night so I do not have to sit there and watch the game download. Come morning, the game is ready to play.
customer_reviews.author: Fxg10

customer_reviews.title: Discontinued for a reason
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this a few months ago, and took incredible care of it - but yet the controller just stopped working suddenly after a few months of use. It's a scam to get you to keep buying more microsoft products essential to make use of the original purchase. Apple is guilty of this as well. Avoid.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan T.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great condition! Very sturdy and protective packaging! Have had zero problems with this purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Michaela Bain

customer_reviews.title: great!
customer_reviews.text: as long as u understand its a digital version only, son loves it. no complaints at all....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As promised
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this Xbox on a whim because all my friends have one and the party chat via Xbox Live is better than trying to deal with the cross compatibility of the PS4/PC/Xbox fro games like Apex and Warzone. It was everything that was promised and generally my complaints are that of Xbox not of the seller. Like having to buy batteries for the controller or rechargeable battery packs as opposed to charging the controller directly to the console. I do like that when I check for network connection it gives me full details which made it easier for me to choose which network to connect to. 10/10 overall
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It arrived earlier then expected. However, it was defective and would not power on.
customer_reviews.author: Donald

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it!!!!! It was packaged in secure box and wrappings. The delivery driver handed it to me in my hand and all of the codes were up to date redeemable! I’m extremely satisfied with my purchase. Update: I’m not sure what happened, maybe from luck of use or something, but it stopped powering all the way on. It only gets to the welcome screen and idles. Not sure why but.....yeah😕
customer_reviews.author: Isis Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, with great price.
customer_reviews.text: Took it to India for my little brother. He loved it. Just because it is on the internet the install period extends. But test all features run smooth Update: My brother loves to play fortnite now and this gaming console has become a part of his daily life.
customer_reviews.author: Ritik

customer_reviews.title: Xbox From Amazon
customer_reviews.text: The xbox came with setup instructions, a remote, and 3 months of Xbox Gold or Ultimate (I don't remember which one it is) for $1.00 Here in May, I now am having a problem with the controller Does anybody know why an xbox controller all of a sudden stops turning on? I tried replacing the batteries and that didn't work. I figured out it was a sync problem, but when I tried to re-sync the controller it wouldn't sync. Now the button just flashes quickly two times and then won't flash again
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Hanvey

product_meta.title: Xbox One S 1TB All-Digital Edition Console (Disc-Free Gaming) - Discontinued
product_meta.description:
Edition:S 1TB All-Digital Edition -(Disc-free Gaming)

Go all digital with the Xbox One S All-Digital Edition and enjoy disc-free gaming with three great digital games included: Sea of Thieves, Fortnite Battle Royale, and Minecraft. Fortnite Battle Royale download also includes 2000 V-Bucks and Legendary Rogue Spider Knight Outfit with 2 Style Variants that unlock as in-game challenges are completed in free Fortnite Battle Royale and Creative modes. Build a library of digital games in the cloud that travels with you; never lose, scratch, or struggle to find a new game to play. Expand your options with Xbox Game Pass (subscription sold separately): get unlimited access to over 100 high-quality games. There’s never been a better way to game with Xbox One.

If purchased through Xbox All Access, the bundle includes 24-month subscription to Xbox Game Pass Ultimate includes Xbox Live Gold, Xbox Game Pass for Console, Xbox Game Pass for PC, and other benefits; game catalog varies over time. Internet access required (ISP fees apply). Membership conversion: your existing Xbox Live Gold and Xbox Game Pass membership(s) will automatically convert to Ultimate at a conversion ratio, learn more xbox.com/gamepass. Digital Direct: Your 24-month Xbox Game Pass Ultimate membership is delivered directly to your console during set-up and is available in Settings; no codes required. Warranty: console is under a 1 year limited hardware warranty (90 days for controller/accessories) regardless of length of financing. (Microsoft Limited Hardware Warranty: https://support.microsoft.com/warranty). Upgrade: Upgrade option after the equivalent of 18 payments for the next Xbox console only, coming Holiday 2020 (excludes Xbox One X, S, and S All Digital Edition). New contract, terms, and pricing apply. Requires return of console in good condition. The next Xbox console available under the upgrade option is subject to FCC rules and will comply with the appropriate FCC rules when available. See product and upgrade terms at Xbox.com/XboxAllAccessTerms.

With approval of Citizens One Line of Credit at 0% APR and 24-month term. Subject to individual credit approval. Total payment amount from $479.76; taxes, shipping, and other charges are extra and may vary (estimated retail price with Xbox One S All-Digital Edition console; prices will vary by console and retailer). See Citizens One Line of Credit Agreement at https://www.citizensone.com/XAA for full terms and conditions.

**Savings based on Estimated Retail Price of items sold separately; actual savings may vary. See retailer for details.
feature_bullets: Go all digital with the Xbox One S all digital edition and enjoy disc free gaming
If purchased through Xbox all access: Enjoy low monthly payments for 24 months, no upfront cost, access to over 100 high-quality games and online multiplayer. Plus console upgrade option

Bundle includes: Xbox One S 1TB All-digital edition console (Disc-free gaming), wireless controller, 1-month of Xbox live gold, and download codes for Minecraft, Sea of thieves and Fortnite Battle Royale

Fortnite Battle Royale content includes 2000 V-Bucks, Legendary Rogue Spider Knight Outfit, and 2 Style Variants that unlock as in-game challenges are completed in free Fortnite Battle Royale and Creative Modes only save the world campaign not included Xbox live gold required to play Fortnite Battle Royale, Sea of Thieves, and multiplayer in minecraft (subscription sold separately)
Pick up where you left off on another Xbox One or Windows 10 PC with Xbox Play anywhere titles like sea of thieves
Your games and saves travel with you: Just sign in on any Xbox One with your Microsoft Account and you’re ready to go
Does not play physical discs: Games are downloaded and ready to play when you are; no need to worry about discs; See bottom of page for important information

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars7,522 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
